Producer: Megan Gilbride, Scott R. Meyers, Trace Sheehan, David DeGrow Shotwell, Steven Walters
Screenwriter: Bryan Poyser, David DeGrow Shotwell, Steven Walters
Synopsis: Two pairs of exes are torn between new flings and getting back together. Will they survive the acts of revenge carried out at the Air Sex World Championships?
Title: The Bounceback
